main event: A luminous object was observed in the sky over Keck, Kentucky on December 6, 1951, by four witnesses including Mrs. Loueilla Keck and her family.
interesting points: The object was described as round, basketball-sized, and luminous with a white or bluish-white glow., It moved rapidly across the sky at about 1,000 feet altitude with no sound or visible trail., The object made abrupt changes in direction and speed, indicating possible intelligent control., This sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes before the object disappeared., The investigation concluded that this sighting could not be identified as any known object or phenomenon.
witness description: Mrs. Loueilla Keck, her husband, and their two children
